column6:
When Hulk, Rick Jones and Monkey the monkey accidentally get sucked into a dimensional vortex, they think they might be in for a little danger. They don't know how right they are! They find themselves in the Microverse, facing off against the ,2008,8
emotion-controlling powers of the Psycho-Man! Hulk has never had so much trouble dealing with such a small problem!
All Ages ...$2.99
